mapper.select: select a.id as id, d.dic_content as applyTypeContent, a.apply_user as applyUser, u1.real_name as applyUserContent, g.pg_name as projectName, a.apply_remark as applyRemark, a.check_status as checkStatus, d1.dic_content as checkStatusContent, u.real_name as checkUserContent, a.apply_time as applyTime, a.check_time as checkTime from (select * from ba_apply ba where 1=1 ) a left join ba_project_group g on g.id=a.pg_id left join sys_data_dic d on a.apply_type = d.dic_code left join sys_data_dic d1 on a.check_status = d1.dic_code left join sys_user u on a.check_user=u.id left join sys_user u1 on a.apply_user=u1.id order by a.check_time desc,a.apply_time desc

select a.id as id, d.dic_content as applyTypeContent, a.apply_remark as applyRemark, a.check_status as checkStatus, a.apply_user as applyUser, u1.real_name as applyUserContent, d1.dic_content as checkStatusContent, u.real_name as checkUserContent, a.apply_time as applyTime, a.check_time as checkTime from ba_apply a left join sys_data_dic d on a.apply_type = d.dic_code left join sys_data_dic d1 on a.check_status = d1.dic_code left join sys_user u on a.check_user=u.id left join sys_user u1 on a.apply_user=u1.id where a.id=#{id} order by a.check_time desc,a.apply_time desc

SELECT w.id , e.emp_name as employeeName, w.work_days , w.attendance_days , w.absenteeism_days , w.sub_status, d.dic_content as subStatusContent, w.float_performance, w.bonus, w.check_work_days, w.work_day_overtime_h, w.weekend_overtime_h, w.festival_overtime_h, w.work_day_overtime_d, w.weekend_overtime_d, w.festival_overtime_d, w.remainder_overtime_lm_h, w.month_overtime_h, w.take_hours_off, w.details , w.remainder_overtime_m_h, w.taxi_fare, w.travel_expenses, w.meals, w.telephone_bill, w.overtime_allowance, w.other_add_cost, w.other_sub_cost, w.remark , w.create_time, w.pg_id, w.employee_id from ba_apply a left join ba_apply_attendance aa on aa.apply_id=a.id left join ba_work_attendance w on aa.attendance_id=w.id inner join ba_pg_emp pe on pe.emp_id=w.employee_id and pe.pg_id=w.pg_id inner join sys_data_dic d on d.dic_code=w.sub_status inner join ba_employee e on pe.emp_id=e.id where a.id=#{applyCo.id} and a.apply_user=#{applyCo.applyUser}
